about_the_game:
Level Down is a 2.5D fast-paced pixel art platformer that challenges your parkour skills, quick reflexes, and strategic thinking. As an astronaut exploring the depths of space, you must ascend through a series of exciting, procedurally generated floors—but beware, every step you take could send the floor crumbling beneath you!

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow Keys – Move

  • Space – Jump

  • Z – Interact

Core Gameplay
Navigate and jump your way to the green arrow, which takes you to the next level. If you miss your step, you’ll fall to the floor below—or worse, tumble multiple levels downward! As you climb, the levels become progressively more difficult, introducing new tile mechanics and environmental hazards to keep you on your toes.

Key Features

  • 100 procedurally generated levels set against a mysterious space backdrop.

  • Dynamic tile mechanics, including:

    • Breakaway Tiles – Collapse after stepping on them.

    • Ice Tiles – Slippery and unpredictable, with variations that shatter or fall.

    • Arrow Tiles – Launch you in the indicated direction, without collapsing.

    • Trampoline Tiles – Propel you to new heights.

    • Red Timer Tiles – Fall three seconds after turning red.

    • And more surprises to master!

  • Checkpoint levels every 5 floors, featuring NPCs to interact with for hints or lore.

  • Original music composed by Blake Hudson.

Level Down combines retro aesthetics with addictive gameplay, perfect for fans of challenging platformers like Jump King. Master the mechanics, push your limits, and see how far you can climb—or fall. Are you ready to face the void?

name: Level Down

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Crashed in space, the floors are collapsing! Run, jump, and reach the top!
